titles.title: A bill for the relief of Denise Glenn.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 3/25/1987--Introduced. Declares a named individual to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act, subject to certain application requirements. Prohibits deportation of such individual under a specified section of such Act.
